about_the_game:
TitTok 3 Sunrise: The director's version, the shocking ending, the real ending of the saga, the author's statement and a special vision of the end of the plot of all parts of the series.


A new fantastic chapter of the saga. The author's performance is only for real fans of the TitTok series!
Eleven completely new, uncharacteristic levels for the series. A different look and a completely new approach to the construction and design of locations.

• 11 new unique levels
• 10 new leaderboards
• 2 new cutscenes
• 1 new achievement
• New, unusual gameplay
• Enchanting impressions
• True Director's Ending
• ABSOLUTELY 100% FREE!

TitTok 3 Sunrise: The director's version is an incredible performance and a direct penetration into the deep consciousness of the player, a fan of the series!
Be careful, the director's version is very difficult to comprehend!
Try it for free, be filled and renew your genetic code!
And remember: "Tit before your Tok!" TikTok ≠ TitTok

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel 1,5 Ghz or AMD analogue
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or NVIDIA/AMD analogue
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
